channel.title: Open Personal Development Plan
channel.description: Recent content on Open Personal Development Plan

item.title: Welcome to this experiment
item.description: Welcome. This is an experiment to document my Personal Development Plan in the open. It replaces a Google Doc which has the following problems: Completed objectives are deleted, effectively lost. Changes are not easily reviewed in a timeline. It’s not easily shared with others for feedback. Not sure if having this is the open is a good idea but it’s at least worth an experiment. Plus I wanted to use Hugo.
